items.sentence: I know that Tom refused to do that with Mary.
I know that Tom might be required to do that.
I thought maybe you wouldn't need to do that.
I thought maybe you wouldn't have to do that.
I think that Tom won't be doing that anymore.
I think that Tom ought to do that by himself.
I think that Tom likes doing that by himself.
I think that Tom and only Tom should do that.
I think that Tom and only Tom has to do that.
I realize that Tom could get Mary to do that.
